\pop[0]The anomaly board has a few postings on it.
An oversized kappa that sometimes shows up to the north of
Raevula on the way towards the Negative Peaks.
\pop[0]This anomaly is known for slapping its victims repeatedly,\.
causing them to be unable to take action due to the sheer
shame of being slapped by such a goofy monster.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
A vengeful robed spirit of darkness that haunts
the Pearl Salt Mines. Supposedly used to be a fisherman
and retained its fondness for water.
\pop[0]This anomaly is a spirit and thus highly resilient against
physical attacks and can weaken anything it touches.
It is recommended to eradicate it with magic without mercy,
or it may steal your soul.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
A sinister faerie queen residing in the depths of
\C[3]The Forest of Dreams\C[0]. It was last seen surrounded
by an entourage of faerie minions somewhat close to a cabin.
\pop[0]While the faerie queen herself poses little challenge
different from the rest, she can summon an infinite number
of faeries making her very dangerous if left unattended.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.

if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
A colossal slimy beast that has otherworldly
in the deepest depths of the \C[2]Forlorn Basin\C[0].
\pop[0]This tricky beasty can regenerate like no tomorrow,
so it is strongly advised to bring a means to mitigate
the self-healing lest you be swinging for days.
\pop[0]Alternatively, if you can \state[11] it up, you may
be able to fell it in a single decisive blow.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
A cobra of the utmost regality- earning the title of "vice".
Its fangs are lethally poisonous. Being regality, it resides
near a castle on the \C[2]Lakeside Road\C[0].
\pop[0]The cobra's poison is one you don't want to be
afflicted with- as it will greatly debilitate you.
This will make you a prime target for its follow up strikes
if you don't die to the poison itself.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
A nasty bandit roaming in the northern \C[2]Erocian Isthmus\C[0].
Supposedly it has been sacrificing its fellow thugs in dark
\pop[0]It is clear that this anomaly is no normal bandit, and
less is known about its tactics aside from the fact that it
must be using dark magic to paralyze its thug allies...
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
A crab that has somehow gained the power to distort
space and time. Its nest is supposedly in the backmost
\pop[0]This anomaly's durability is a special power all to its
own. Its ability to distort time and space render it able
to strike numerous times, and with critical precision. Be
wary if you intend to go toe-to-toe with it.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
The most ruthless of bearcats possessing ghastly powers
from beyond. Remembering their living years, they yearn for water,
and admire fountain in the \C[2]Erocian Kingdom\C[0].
\pop[0]Its haunting howl will stop you in your tracks if
you are too close. It is said that its ghastly origins enable
it to drink even the darkest voidal magics into its being.
if the quest isn't yet unlocked, unlock it.
\pop[0]Your quest log was updated with this anomaly.
There have been difficulties in making sure certain
skills are NOT autoassigned for allies that otherwise
have no ability to manipulate their assigned skills.
This reassigns their default skills to their slots.
